questions.1: What is your idea of perfect happiness?
questions.3: What is the trait you most deplore in yourself?
questions.4: What is the trait you most deplore in others?
questions.5: Which living person do you most admire?
questions.7: What is your current state of mind?
questions.8: What do you consider the most overrated virtue?
questions.9: On what occasion do you lie?
questions.10: What do you most dislike about your appearance?
questions.11: Which living person do you most despise?
questions.12: What is the quality you most like in a man?
questions.13: What is the quality you most like in a woman?
questions.14: Which words or phrases do you most overuse?
questions.15: What or who is the greatest love of your life?
questions.16: When and where were you happiest?
questions.17: Which talent would you most like to have?
questions.18: If you could change one thing about yourself, what would it be?
questions.19: What do you consider your greatest achievement?
questions.20: If you were to die and come back as a person or a thing, what would it be?
questions.21: Where would you most like to live?
questions.22: What is your most treasured possession?
questions.23: What do you regard as the lowest depth of misery?
questions.25: What is your most marked characteristic?
questions.26: What do you most value in your friends?
questions.28: Who is your hero of fiction?
questions.29: Which historical figure do you most identify with?
questions.30: Who are your heroes in real life?
questions.32: What is it that you most dislike?
questions.34: How would you like to die?
